query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `badges` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `name` varchar(100) NOT NULL,
  `description` text NOT NULL,
  `icon` varchar(50),
  `category` enum('metas','pdi','avaliacao','feedback','geral') NOT NULL,
  `points` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `condition` text,
  `isActive` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT true,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
)
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2zjpxFGuGsCP7jR.root --database Vd5BJ8toX8cUC4zST6itFN --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `badges` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `name` varchar(100) NOT NULL,
  `description` text NOT NULL,
  `icon` varchar(50),
  `category` enum('metas','pdi','avaliacao','feedback','geral') NOT NULL,
  `points` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `condition` text,
  `isActive` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT true,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
)
